name: BLOCC (FinalSynapse)
description:
B.L.O.C.C

an educational tool made to help high school students who are interested in games development decide which discipline might be right for them! This was made as a part of a 48 Hour Game-Jam hosted by AIE

Create levels, Build out distinct character, and Code enemy AI.

*To get your final publishing score, access the menu twice*

Credits:

Design & Programming:

 Euan Wynne-Jones, Lukasz Dziedziczak , Jackson Hole

Art:

 Camillie Bird, Scott Bruno, Flynn Eickhoff 

Special thanks to the staff members who hosted this event at AIE Adelaide
